Wayne State College Wayne, Nebraska 69878
WAYNE STATE COLLEGE WAYNE, NEBRASKA FOUNDED 1910 R.M.C. 2001-2030
W.A. Brandenburg President
div1.p: I wish to invite you to read poetry in lieu of the traditional address at the spring commencement exercises of Wayne State College, Monday, April 12 at 7:30 p.m.

The honorarium is $300, and we will reimburse you for milage from Lincoln at ten cents per mile. Guest rooms at the college will be available for you and Mr. and Mrs. Julius Young, in the event they accompany you to Wayne; of, we will make reservations in the local motel if you prefer.

Our program will contain the traditional awarding of degrees, music, greetings from the governing board, your poetry reading and a brief charge to the graduating class by me. There will be no speeches in the traditional sense.
I hope you will find it possible to accept this invitation.

closer.note: Suggested length of poetry reading: 20-25 minutes.
